title: Was TV Ever Truly Monoculture and More Questions from the Mailbag | The Watch
description:
We break open the mailbag to answer questions about the new ‘Game of Thrones’ trailer (4:16), the year in television so far (16:00), and how big of a competitor Disney+ will be (28:56).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
